segments.text: All of you have reported your achievements . I'd like to remind you that we must be aware of the threat we face .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The same with the previous speaker , we must know how things stand with us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we must keep a clear mind with the tough competition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the time to emphasize sense of crises .
segments.speaker: S2
